channel.title: Aforementioned on Priceless Trainwreck
channel.description: Recent content in Aforementioned on Priceless Trainwreck

item.title: November 2019 Set 1
item.description: November 2019 Set 1 Secret build looking huge and good. When it will enter the pipelines the video game world gonna stagger. I opened my Star Citizen account 6 1⁄2 years ago. You plan on giving me 1⁄3 of the game I was promised over a year from now. If we don’t get the ENTIRE game we were promises, I will be suing you into oblivion!!! And I will be one among many!

item.title: 2017 August Set 1
item.description: 2017 - August Set 1 G0RF “Soon there will be a jump gate that can take me to the Helios system! I bet we’ll have underwater vehicles by then and I can explore the vast depths of Helios II! I’m going to set up deep sea mining operations as soon as its live so I can get a head start carving out my thrilling future as an Oceanic Mining Tycoon!
